summary:

Part 2 did not disappoint.. I was surprised how much I really enjoyed it and all the original character..

Eddie & Arsenio never skipped a beat.. and the rest were great.. I laughed, danced , sang along .. and ultimately shed a few tears overcome w the nostalgia of it all..and the realization that I am 30 yrs older.. yikes.. Review Title: Surprised how much I LOVED this one!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/05/02 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'blackface', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Čeština', '日本語', 'Português', 'Magyar', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Nelson Cragg', 'Daniel Stamm', 'Janicza Bravo', 'Craig William Macneill', 'Ti West'], 'Producers': ['Little Marvin', 'David Matthews', 'Roy Lee', 'Miri Yoon', 'Lena Waithe', 'Don Kurt', 'Nelson Cragg', 'Larysa Kondracki', 'Seth Zvi Rosenfeld', 'Dustin Bernard', 'Michael Nelson', 'Brian Wankum'], 'Starring': ['Deborah Ayorinde', 'Ashley Thomas', 'Alison Pill'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: An unflinching look at American feral white racism and it's omnipresent toxicity metastasizing in Black America...Grips you thoroughly. the white violence, and cruelty is factual and well documented.. yet jarring and hard to watch.. while commanding your gaze and attention.

THEM ignites a searing awakening for too many... traumatic to watch in light of daily white terrorism perpetuated upon Black Americans today which again has become commonplace by white males in blue uniforms in the name of "law n order".

Them is a horror show with a caveat..as the real "monsters" are the white bosses, white cops, white co workers, white neighbors we interact with every day..with that awareness that to survive and thrive among them.. you are compelled to protect yourself from them emotionally and physically at all costs.

My advice:
white people: Leave your white fragility outside.. and take it all in..without dismissal, self righteous anger or denial
Black people: Prepare yourself for plenty of angst, emo, vindication and righteous rage.. and feeling all the "feels"..

"THEM" ..is Amerikkka. Review Title: America forced to look in the Mirror at its Ugly reflection... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/05/16 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Eugene Ashe'], 'Producers': ['Eugene Ashe', 'Chijioke Asomugha', 'Nnamdi Asomugha', 'Jonathan T. Baker', 'Emmet Dennis', 'Jay Gaines', 'Akbar Gbajabiamila', 'Gabrielle Glore', 'Bobbi Sue Luther', 'Ikenna Mmeje'], 'Starring': ['Tessa Thompson', 'Nnamdi Asomugha', 'Eva Longoria'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: I only gave it 4 stars because #1 We know white racism was omnipresent everywhere during this period.. Yet in this movie, America is apparently a sweet colorblind society.. The only hint of racism was her cousins mention of a civil rights march .. #2 For a man who's passion is music.. he didn't seem too conflicted about taking a welding job..
#3 They tried to present her husband as a callous man when it was obvious he was just hurt as he mentioned luving someone who regarded him as "second best"..
I enjoyed the music and the drama ( not a lot of that though) but interesting story... Kept my attn Review Title: Cute Formula Love Story Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/07/31 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Timothy A. Smith'], 'Producers': ['Tobias A. Smith'], 'Starring': ['Dick Gregory', 'Charles Ogletree', 'Mae Louise Miller'], 'Studio': ['Tobias A. Smith']} Review Text: Truly Horrifying - Modern day slavery hidden in plain sight. The white "just-us" system rounding up Black citizenry to "work on state owned plantations" ...... resulting in whites subjecting Black Americans to ugly savagery "because they can" and "because it maintains their white wealth" .."just for the sake of sadistic cruelty" ..... is truly nothing short of parasitic barbarism.

Hearing how a white woman allowed the feral white males in her family to repeatedly rape/ abuse a 5yr old girl (then "wash away" the evidence.) as her mother is raped a well.. literally made me sick and enraged.. Constantly beating these people and making them work around the clock.. all points to the question .. Are these "people" inflicting such cruelty even human? or evil in in human flesh?.

This makes the viewer very aware of why so many anti CRT whites fight to keep the ugly truth hidden Review Title: Unflinching Truth .. Exposes what the anti-CRT mob fears Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/08/08 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'Português [Descrição do áudio]', 'हिन्दी', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português [SDH]', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Luis Pinheiro', 'Dainara Toffoli'], 'Producers': ['Luciana Mestre', 'Joana Cooper', 'Gustavo Gontijo', 'Carol Alckmin', 'Andrea Barata Ribeiro', 'Bel Berlinck', 'Miguel de Almeida', 'Rodolfo Iriñiz'], 'Starring': ['Liniker', 'Gustavo Coelho', 'Thomás Aquino'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: Superb acting...The lil boy was a standout..and the Mom really did an awesome portrayal of homeless familys.. heartbreaking stuff
Cassandra? um.. well Super hard to feel empathy for a person so supremely callous selfish and self absorbed.. but thats fine acting still// Review Title: Compelling Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/08/15 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ian Lilley'], 'Producers': ['Ian Lilley'], 'Starring': ['Neil Oliver'], 'Studio': ['Dreamscape Media']} Review Text: Groundbreaking.. I never heard about the origins of the klan..Always wondered by the most virulent racists have irish sounding surnames, why most slavers had irish sounding surnames... and why the irish became police to attack Black citizenry "legally" , Connecting the dots...
These were poor downtrodden scotch irish in their own country, fleeing poverty and oppression.. came to these shores and instead of assimilating into the culture.. decided to destroy it and pretend this is "anglo country".. These were the countrys first Terrorists... Review Title: Immigrants who became Terrorists Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/08/31 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Loki Mulholland'], 'Producers': ['Loki Mulholland', 'Tyson Maughan'], 'Starring': ['Loki Mulholland', 'Luvaghn Brown', 'Joan Trumpauer Mulholland']} Review Text: Loki is obviously "not there yet" .. He is conflicted and obviously very torn between the love his has for monsters ( his slaver klancestors) vs his struggle for white enlightenment about racism.
There were a few times wherein he described doing and saying racist things but "unaware they were racists".. the old "unconscious racism" line .. they attempt to cast whiteness in a light of "well meaning.. just misguided" light..

Quite obviously whites who tell n** jokes and regarding others as "lessors" are WELL aware of their racism.. They just don't care... Another aspect is the constant use of thr word :slave. Africans were never slaves.. They were free people who were "enslaved". Saying someone "owned slaves" takes culpability from the slaver.. Nobody is inherently a slave..it is an attempt to remove the humanity from the human being.

The cringe moments were the lectures.. the white male lecturing on atrocities endured by Black people as if this were something new and just discovered. The sad reality is the white audience are more likely to take the accounts as "legitimate" from a white mans mouth.. vs when Black Americans speak on the history.. they are oft dismissed as " complainers" who need to "move on".

white racists today are no different than their predecessors.. Today you hear them make a "both sides" argument.. about slavery.. Its like German Nazis making a "both sides" argument about the Holocaust Review Title: A duality of white Terrorism & white Liberal naiveite Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/11/01 Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Simon Egan'], 'Producers': ['Lucy Hetherington', 'David Henshaw', 'Michael Chrisman'], 'Starring': ['Paul Rhys']} Review Text: The Duality here? Its great these monied Euro slimebags who are molesting these vulnerable children. Great that they are exposed and prosecuted.. (Even though most get a slap on the wrist.. )
BUT.. Attempting to portray BUSH and ICE as "good people" is a farce. and fallacious.. America wasn't caring about these kids when funding the Khmer Rouge brutal regime. Bush himself sure wasn't caring about children when he invaded the middle east taking the lives of countless children..(and their parents) Review Title: American Propaganda Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Manor Review Date: 2021/11/02 Categories: Horror, Eerie, Nail-Biting, Ominous Product Description: ['After suffering a mild stroke, Judith Albright reluctantly moves into a historic nursing home where she becomes convinced a supernatural force is killing the residents. Part of the Welcome to the Blumhouse collection.'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Axelle Carolyn'], 'Producers': ['Jason Blum', 'Jeremy Gold', 'Marci Wiseman', 'Lisa Bruce', 'Sandy King', 'Richard J Bosner'], 'Starring': ['Barbara Hershey', 'Bruce Davidson', 'Nicholas Alexander']} Review Text: Dreadful plot ..non sensical.. Hershey looks good for her age.. thats the only positive thing I can say about it.. Review Title: Ridiculous waste of time Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/11/04 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jay Chapman'], 'Producers': ['Lisa Blum', 'Jim Sharon', 'Brian Volk-Weiss'], 'Starring': ['Arnez J'], 'Studio': ['Comedy Dynamics']} Review Text: I could not get past the first 16 mins of this when I had to shut this guy off..NOT because this man was unfunny , He was starting off with some really funny anecdotes.. but he's dropping n*** bombs left and right non stop.. I don't understand this trend of too many Black comedians who feel they cant tell a joke without denigrating their own race in such an awful and denigrating manner..

I wanted to watch more but every sentence was peppered so often with the n-word.. my heart sank. It was like someone serving up your favorite meal.. laced w dirt and dead flies.. repulsive .

Noticed how he respectfully referred to white people as "white people".. Mexicans as "mexicans".. Asians as "Asians".. but Black people were non stopped referred to as n***..... to the delight of the audience..
I was wondering with the lynchings and Anti- Black violence fueling this word... why use it as fodder for "comedy"? I dont see Jerry Seinfeld racially denigrating Jews and joking about the Holocaust..

With all the racism and anti Black sentiment which has infested this nation to a crippling degree right now.. why fuel and affirm the hatred like this? Review Title: "Racially Motivated" is correct.. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/01/22 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Jeannie Gaffigan'], 'Producers': ['Jim Gaffigan', 'Cisco Henson', 'Jeannie Gaffigan', 'Brian Volk-Weiss'], 'Starring': ['Jim Gaffigan'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: Im VERY PICKY with what I consider funny... I find most comedians today to be corny .. unfunny and trying too hard.. But Jim Gaffigan is a stand out HILARIOUS.. Effortless humor.. A Real Talent.
He's just a naturally funny guy and reminds me of Chris Farley...
He is funny without having to be gross and vulgar.. I want to see more of his stand up specials now! Review Title: Hilarious! Giving me Chris Farkey vibes! Luv him! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Cassandra? um.. well Super hard to feel empathy for a person so supremely callous selfish and self absorbed.. but thats fine acting still// Review Title: Compelling Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/08/15 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ian Lilley'], 'Producers': ['Ian Lilley'], 'Starring': ['Neil Oliver'], 'Studio': ['Dreamscape Media']} Review Text: Groundbreaking.. I never heard about the origins of the klan..Always wondered by the most virulent racists have irish sounding surnames, why most slavers had irish sounding surnames... and why the irish became police to attack Black citizenry "legally" , Connecting the dots...
These were poor downtrodden scotch irish in their own country, fleeing poverty and oppression.. came to these shores and instead of assimilating into the culture.. decided to destroy it and pretend this is "anglo country".. These were the countrys first Terrorists... Review Title: Immigrants who became Terrorists Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/08/31 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Loki Mulholland'], 'Producers': ['Loki Mulholland', 'Tyson Maughan'], 'Starring': ['Loki Mulholland', 'Luvaghn Brown', 'Joan Trumpauer Mulholland']} Review Text: Loki is obviously "not there yet" .. He is conflicted and obviously very torn between the love his has for monsters ( his slaver klancestors) vs his struggle for white enlightenment about racism.
There were a few times wherein he described doing and saying racist things but "unaware they were racists".. the old "unconscious racism" line .. they attempt to cast whiteness in a light of "well meaning.. just misguided" light..

Quite obviously whites who tell n** jokes and regarding others as "lessors" are WELL aware of their racism.. They just don't care... Another aspect is the constant use of thr word :slave. Africans were never slaves.. They were free people who were "enslaved". Saying someone "owned slaves" takes culpability from the slaver.. Nobody is inherently a slave..it is an attempt to remove the humanity from the human being.

The cringe moments were the lectures.. the white male lecturing on atrocities endured by Black people as if this were something new and just discovered. The sad reality is the white audience are more likely to take the accounts as "legitimate" from a white mans mouth.. vs when Black Americans speak on the history.. they are oft dismissed as " complainers" who need to "move on".

white racists today are no different than their predecessors.. Today you hear them make a "both sides" argument.. about slavery.. Its like German Nazis making a "both sides" argument about the Holocaust Review Title: A duality of white Terrorism & white Liberal naiveite Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/11/01 Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Simon Egan'], 'Producers': ['Lucy Hetherington', 'David Henshaw', 'Michael Chrisman'], 'Starring': ['Paul Rhys']} Review Text: The Duality here? Its great these monied Euro slimebags who are molesting these vulnerable children. Great that they are exposed and prosecuted.. (Even though most get a slap on the wrist.. )
BUT.. Attempting to portray BUSH and ICE as "good people" is a farce. and fallacious.. America wasn't caring about these kids when funding the Khmer Rouge brutal regime. Bush himself sure wasn't caring about children when he invaded the middle east taking the lives of countless children..(and their parents) Review Title: American Propaganda Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Manor Review Date: 2021/11/02 Categories: Horror, Eerie, Nail-Biting, Ominous Product Description: ['After suffering a mild stroke, Judith Albright reluctantly moves into a historic nursing home where she becomes convinced a supernatural force is killing the residents. Part of the Welcome to the Blumhouse collection.'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Axelle Carolyn'], 'Producers': ['Jason Blum', 'Jeremy Gold', 'Marci Wiseman', 'Lisa Bruce', 'Sandy King', 'Richard J Bosner'], 'Starring': ['Barbara Hershey', 'Bruce Davidson', 'Nicholas Alexander']} Review Text: Dreadful plot ..non sensical.. Hershey looks good for her age.. thats the only positive thing I can say about it.. Review Title: Ridiculous waste of time Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/11/04 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jay Chapman'], 'Producers': ['Lisa Blum', 'Jim Sharon', 'Brian Volk-Weiss'], 'Starring': ['Arnez J'], 'Studio': ['Comedy Dynamics']} Review Text: I could not get past the first 16 mins of this when I had to shut this guy off..NOT because this man was unfunny , He was starting off with some really funny anecdotes.. but he's dropping n*** bombs left and right non stop.. I don't understand this trend of too many Black comedians who feel they cant tell a joke without denigrating their own race in such an awful and denigrating manner..

I wanted to watch more but every sentence was peppered so often with the n-word.. my heart sank. It was like someone serving up your favorite meal.. laced w dirt and dead flies.. repulsive .

Noticed how he respectfully referred to white people as "white people".. Mexicans as "mexicans".. Asians as "Asians".. but Black people were non stopped referred to as n***..... to the delight of the audience..
I was wondering with the lynchings and Anti- Black violence fueling this word... why use it as fodder for "comedy"? I dont see Jerry Seinfeld racially denigrating Jews and joking about the Holocaust..

With all the racism and anti Black sentiment which has infested this nation to a crippling degree right now.. why fuel and affirm the hatred like this? Review Title: "Racially Motivated" is correct.. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/01/22 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Jeannie Gaffigan'], 'Producers': ['Jim Gaffigan', 'Cisco Henson', 'Jeannie Gaffigan', 'Brian Volk-Weiss'], 'Starring': ['Jim Gaffigan'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: Im VERY PICKY with what I consider funny... I find most comedians today to be corny .. unfunny and trying too hard.. But Jim Gaffigan is a stand out HILARIOUS.. Effortless humor.. A Real Talent.
He's just a naturally funny guy and reminds me of Chris Farley...
He is funny without having to be gross and vulgar.. I want to see more of his stand up specials now! Review Title: Hilarious! Giving me Chris Farkey vibes! Luv him! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **High Engagement with Content:** This individual consistently rates films highly, particularly those eliciting strong emotional responses, such as nostalgia, humor, or social commentary.
- **Themes of Nostalgia and Cultural Reflection:** Enjoys content revisiting past experiences and societal issues, especially reflecting on racial dynamics and personal histories.
- **Strong Themes of Racism and Social Justice:** Shows a tendency to engage with films addressing systemic racism, historical perspectives, and the impacts of white supremacy.
- **Mixed Reactions to Humor:** Prefers comedy that is thoughtful and avoids vulgar or offensive humor. Displays high sensitivity to racially charged language in comedic contexts.
- **Diverse Interests in Genres:** Reviews span various genres including comedies, dramas, and horror, highlighting a preference for powerful narratives irrespective of format.
- **Critical of Content Quality:** Attentive to film quality, often expressing disappointment in poorly executed plots, highlighting a discerning taste in entertainment.
- **Support for Strong Performances:** Acknowledges and appreciates robust acting, indicating a preference for character-driven narratives.

This individual's viewing habits reflect a deep engagement with socially relevant themes, a preference for quality storytelling, and a strong reaction to comedic elements that touch on racial and cultural nuances.

target_interaction.title: I stand corrected
target_interaction.text:
... as a thin women I went into this like " umm promoting obesity isnt healthy blah blah Lizzo can get on my last nerve",.. BUT after watching this.. it opened my eyes.. This is not about promoting unhealthiness..
But rather about self love and acceptance.. not letting others define you or judge you. Im sure these young women are saaavy enough to know being overweight can bring health issues.. BUT you need to love YOURSELF before changing yourself.. and this is a great and powerful step towards acceptance of SELF weather your fat or skinny.
It was uplifting to see Black women empowered and embracing self acceptance since we have been denigrated 400 yrs and told we are "not good enough".
These are very sweet charming young women and I loved seeing them move toward self love

Content advisory: P — This program contains product placement
